con:assertion.name: Verify if a order id is generated

con:restRequest.name: Pay for the Order
con:restRequest.con:request: { "action" : "placeOrdercc", "cc_money" : "${Post Order#Response#$[0]['Item Total Price']}", "cc_name" : "S s", "cc_number" : "1234123412341234", "cc_exp_mo" : "01", "cc_exp_yr" : "2018", "cc_cvv" : "123", "id" : "${Post Order#Response#$[0]['Order ID']}" }

con:assertion.name: Verify if the transaction is success
